trans-unit.resname: GN2·1 | Highcliff Felidar | Card Text | Paragraph 1
GN2·1 | Highcliff Felidar | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, for each opponent, choose a creature with the greatest power among creatures that player controls. Destroy those creatures.
trans-unit.target: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, for each opponent, choose a creature with the greatest power among creatures that player controls. Destroy those creatures.

GN2·2 | Sphinx of Enlightenment | Card Text | Paragraph 1
GN2·2 | Sphinx of Enlightenment | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, target opponent draws a card and you draw three cards.
trans-unit.target: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, target opponent draws a card and you draw three cards.

trans-unit.resname: GN2·3 | Calculating Lich | Card Text | Paragraph 1
GN2·3 | Calculating Lich | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature attacks one of your opponents, that player loses 1 life.
trans-unit.target: Whenever a creature attacks one of your opponents, that player loses 1 life.

trans-unit.resname: GN2·4 | Fiendish Duo | Card Text | Paragraph 1
GN2·4 | Fiendish Duo | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: If a source would deal damage to an opponent, it deals double that damage to that player instead.
trans-unit.target: If a source would deal damage to an opponent, it deals double that damage to that player instead.

trans-unit.resname: GN2·5 | Earthshaker Giant | Card Text | Paragraph 1
GN2·5 | Earthshaker Giant | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, other creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, other creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.
